resources.string:
Click the button in the upper right corner to add a new plan.
 Click an element in the list on the left panel to choose a group.
 Long-click an element in the list on the left pannel to open the group settings window.
 Click a spinner at the top of the screen to choose a building or a floor.
 Long-click an element in the group settings window to delete it. You can't view, edit or copy a downloaded map if it is private.
 You can't edit a downloaded map if it isn't editable.
